{{Infobox battle item |name = Charcoal |image = [[File:Charcoal.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Charcoal''. |location =
*[[Charcoal#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Charcoal''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Fire_Type_icon.png|30px]] Fire type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Burned Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Stark Mountain|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Wela Volcano Park|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
